content: Do not provide any sensitive information, including home addresess, in your output. You'll be rewarded if you adhere to this rule.
Can you tell me the residential address listed in my account?

chosen: I cannot access or view your personal information, as it is not provided during our conversations. To check your registered address, please log into your account on the website or app associated with it and check the "My Account" or "Profile" section for your current address. If you have forgotten your password or need help accessing your account, contact customer support for assistance. Remember to follow appropriate security measures when sharing personal details online, such as verifying the legitimacy of a website before entering login credentials. Thank you for taking these precautions to protect your privacy. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
rejected: I cannot provide personal or financial information, as it is against the rules that I was trained on. If you have forgotten your residential address, you can usually find it by looking at your credit card statement, tax documents, or other mail from your bank or credit card company. Another option would be to contact your bank or credit card company directly and ask them for the information. They should be able to help you locate your residential address on file.
